speaker: JAQUES
text: Which is he that killed the deer?

speaker: JAQUES
text: Duke like a Roman conqueror. And it would do well

speaker: JAQUES
text: to set the deer’s horns upon his head for a branch of

speaker: JAQUES
text: victory.—Have you no song, forester, for this

text: Sing it. ’Tis no matter how it be in tune, so it
